formerUsers.notes: Original user, died and fruit was stolen by Blackbeard

abilitiesRevealed.description: The user grabs the sky and swings their hands down, tilting entire islands and creating massive earthquakes and tsunamis. This attack can affect areas hundreds of miles away.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Tilts Marineford
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard uses the Gura Gura no Mi to perform 'Shima Yurashi', tilting the entire island of Marineford and creating earthquakes so powerful they generate tsunamis that reach Sabaody Archipelago.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Blackbeard's growing mastery of the stolen power and establishes the global threat he poses. Despite being inexperienced, he can already perform devastating attacks.

keyMoments.title: Global Impact of Earthquake Power
keyMoments.description: The effects of Blackbeard's earthquake reach Sabaody Archipelago, causing tsunamis and chaos across multiple islands.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the terrifying range and world-shaking potential of the Gura Gura no Mi when used by someone with Blackbeard's ambition.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

trivia: Blackbeard admits his inexperience with the power during this episode, despite already being able to perform devastating attacks like Shima Yurashi.
